long_description: This compact, take-along flashlight features a high-intensity adjustable light beam (Spot to Flood). One AAA battery plus extra bulb included so you're ready to go. Rugged, machined aluminum construction with knurled design for a better grip. Anodized inside and out for improved corrosion resistance. Innovative extended key lead allows the light beam and key to be used together in the same direction. Water and shock resistant.
short_description: This compact, take-along flashlight features a high-intensity adjustable light beam (Spot to Flood).
